description: Love accidentally forgot to refil the Cure Vitan, Chiffon`s food, and lost the contact to get more. Chiffon cannot get food from Linkrun, so Love has to cook something for Chiffon. Cure Peach`s new weapon, the Peach Rod, first appears in this episode.

titles.title: Chiffon Dai Pinch! Peach no Atarashii Chikara!!
Chiffon`s in Big Trouble! Peach`s New Powers!!
シフォン大ピンチ! ピーチの新しい力!!
